sources.title: The Prize Guest (1939)
sources.description: A strange man checks into a hotel under the name "?", and proceeds to float through the air, run outside the ledges outside and do a high wire bicycle act high over the city, taking along the unwilling house detective. It turns out to be an advertising stunt. Watch on RetroFlix:Â  https://retroflix.org/the-prize-guest-1939/

metadata.Plot: A strange man checks into a hotel under the name "?", and proceeds to float through the air, run outside the ledges outside and do a high wire bicycle act high over the city, taking along the unwilling house detective. It turns out to be an advertising stunt.
metadata.Writer: John Foster, Donald McKee, Tom Morrison
